venue.address_2: Off of Beacon Street - landmarks State House & Fox TV
venue.name: 21st Amendment

item.description:
Hey All...

It seems that we have a large number... of members who love to travel. So Let's meet sometime/somewhere and discuss possible trip ideas.

Further, we can also use this time to share with each other our own travel experiences and learn from one another as well.

We can share with each other best deal finders/practices and best of websites for booking flights, hotels, and complete trip packages. There is Always.... something to learn... deals to be made and places to go.... :) And, it has been my experience that many of the best places you'll ever find in this world, many of them are indeed off the beaten path.

I've found it helpful to talk to other world travelers. I often learned from others when to go and when not to go to certain places around the globe. And, while I don't always listen to every word another says about a particular longitude and latitude because I still enjoy the adventure and making up my own mind about a place. With that said, though, I have gotten interesting and sometimes valuable tips on hidden gems that I might never have stumbled onto otherwise. In addition, I am constantly stumbling so I'm always discovering new and unexpected places to share with others. Especially in NYC. I must have walked about every inch of that city. I'm not kidding either :)

By the way... has anyone heard about an airline from Ireland wanting to charge only $30 flights from Boston to Ireland? It's been a while since I've been over to Ireland. Also... been wanting to go to Africa, Scotland and Iceland. In the US... Alaska/Canada to see the Northern Lights. I also love to go to Nantucket, Seattle, San Fran, DC, London and Paris. And would like to get back to Russia, Germany and Italy at some point.

And needless to say... but I'll say it anyway, I love Manhattan, which I consider to be the best city in the world.

Cheers,
Michael

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Travel Enthusiasts let's talk - 21st Amendment
